summary: Transitive dependency semver 7.5.0 has a ReDoS vulnerability (CVE-2022-25883) with CVSS score 7.5. The vulnerable package is pulled in through ts-loader, affecting the test coverage build artifact.
userImpact: Users could experience denial of service attacks if untrusted data is provided to the vulnerable semver Range function in test artifacts.
rootCause: semver package before version 7.5.2 contains a ReDoS vulnerability in the Range function when processing untrusted input
proposedFix: Upgrade semver to version 7.5.2 or later, or upgrade ts-loader which is the direct dependency bringing in the vulnerable semver version
resolutionDetails: Issue was automatically closed when the vulnerable library was removed from the inventory or marked as ignored in the Mend system
keyQuote: Versions of the package semver before 7.5.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the function new Range
